description:
Zoro and his fairy friend argue over directions, Trafalgar Law finds himself outnumbered in his battle with Doflamingo, and Luffy`s latest opponent packs an explosive punch!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!
Le canon destructeur. Lucy au bord de la défaite !
Мощь взрывного кулака. Луси в затруднительном положении
انفجار المدفع المدمّر! لوسي في ورطة!
破壊砲炸裂! ルーシー危機一髪
